Spotted Fever Rickettsiosis (Tests for Rickettsia species by Culture and Identification Method)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    5878-4 Rickettsia sp identified in Blood by Organism specific culture
    6544-1 Rickettsia sp identified in Genital specimen by Organism specific culture
    6545-8 Rickettsia sp identified in Sputum by Organism specific culture
    6546-6 Rickettsia sp identified in Unspecified specimen by Organism specific culture
